article.title: L-3 Receives Technical and Engineering Support Option
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: L-3 Services Incorporated, Mount Laurel, New Jersey, is being awarded a $9,536,470 modification to a previously awarded indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract to exercise an option for technical and engineering support for the Naval Air Systems Command Structures Division (AIR 4.3), to include data analysis, information systems, and software functions of the Structural Appraisal of Fatigue Effects Program. The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
